firstNationalityHint: Start typing a nationality, then choose from the list. Welsh
secondNationalityHintDetails: Dual citizenship (also known as dual nationality) is allowed in some countries. This means you can be a citizen of your own country and another country. Welsh
thirdNationalityHintDetails: Multiple citizenship (also known as multiple nationality) is allowed in some countries. This means you can be a citizen of your own country and two other countries. Welsh
error-invalidNationalityNoNationality: Select a nationality from the list Welsh
error-invalidNationalityDoubleSecondNati: Enter a different second nationality Welsh
error-invalidNationalityDoubleThirdNatio: Enter a different third nationality Welsh
